name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Providence West Warwick

reviews.title: Nothing but good things to say...
reviews.text: OK, so it's not the George V. But West Warwick is not Paris. Or even Newport, where the hotels were double the price of this hotel. But for the location, this hotel is just great.

reviews.title: Not that bad of a stay
reviews.text: The front desk staff: friendly and extremely helpful.

reviews.title: Loved this hotel
reviews.text: Accommodations: comfortable, clean, have all the necessities right there in the room (including iron/ironing board/refrigerator/coffee maker/blow dryer) so no calls to housekeeping needed.

We stayed on Sunday, May 27 over the Memorial Day weekend. The hotel was perfect for our family of three. The pull out sofa was comfortable as was our king mattress. The shower was great. Having the internet in the lobby with nearby table and chairs, was a perfect work place for our teen to write a paper for school. Though there was a nice indoor pool, we were too busy to use it. There was 24/7 coffee, tea and hot chocolate which complemented the excellent breakfast in the morning. I highly recommend this hotel and would look forward to staying here again. The staff were friendly and helpful; and the drive to the Newport Mansions was quick and easy.
reviews.title: loved this hotel

reviews.text: I had stayed at this property over a weekend in May for a wedding. It
reviews.title: Clean, spacious and convenient

likes.liked: — The rooms were clean and spacious
likes.disliked: — Street signs (or lackof) in Rhode Island are very frustrating

reviews.text: was blocked off for guest of the wedding party. In addition, there were many graduations in the area, so we were fortunate there were rooms at this location. Definitely keep that in mind if you are staying in the area of Providence during May - the peak college graduation time! Book way in advanced, if possible.
reviews.title: Very nice stay...

reviews.text: The hotel is located right off of the I-95. A previous reviewer had mentioned a tip about the James Ind Murphy Highway is not really a highway. That was very helpful, as the road signs in Rhode Island are virtually useless and nonexistent. It's literally a small road - when you see that Wendy's on the right, make the left.
reviews.title: What a lovely stay!

reviews.text: When you drive down the road, you'll see Comfort Inn Suites first on your right - many guests thought that was the Springhill Suites, so make sure to drive past it and you'll see Springhill Suites on the left.
reviews.title: Very Pleased

aka: Springhill Suites By Marriott Providence West Warwick Hotel
